name: Block Dungeon (itch)
description:
Do you love any of the following things?

  • Fire ball
  • Lots of fire balls
  • Explosion
  • Lots of explosions
  • Skeletons and their BOSS, all in one tiny dungeon

If so, don't miss this little dungeon crawler.

GAME HINT

  • Keep smashing treasure boxes and collect power-ups (shiny A/B letters)
  • The walls can be destroyed too

This game is a compo entry of Ludum Dare #31.
